Description: 3 sherds, two of them joining, from 2 different vessel. A: Body sherd of an egyptian wheel made vessel, with post-firing pot-mark on exterior showing a circle and five plus x lines running into the centre. B: Two joining rim sherds of a marl clay vessel, originally glued. Outer rim diameter 10cm.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
